content: © kate wood send comments or suggestions to tinypantswood@gmail com 1 these fancy fantail goldfish work up quickly you may wind up with an aquarium s worth fantail goldfish come in a variety of colors so experiment with hues like orange black white yellow and of course gold play around and mix up your fin and body colors or make a fantasy fish in any color of the rainbow you ll need… approximately 85 yards of worsted weight yarn f hook safety eyes buttons or scrap yarn in a contrasting color for embroidered eyes a small amount of embroidery floss to sew on mouth and a sewing needle yarn needle stitch marker fiber fill or other stuffing body the fish s body is worked continuously in the round use a stitch marker to keep track of your rounds round 1 crochet 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring round 2 * 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x 12 sts round 3 * single_crochet 3 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * 3x 15 sts round 4 * single_crochet 4 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * 3x 18 sts round 5 * single_crochet 5 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * 3x 21 sts round 6 * single_crochet 6 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * 3x 24 sts round 7 * single_crochet 7 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * 3x 27 sts round 8 * single_crochet 8 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * 3x 30 sts round 9 *single_crochet 3 decrease repeat from * 6x 24 sts © kate wood send comments or suggestions to tinypantswood@gmail com 2 round 10 single_crochet around 24 sts row 9 and 10 define your fish s head pause here to make face you can embroider eyes affix safety eyes or sew on buttons whichever you choose they should sit around row 6 or so use embroidery floss to backstitch on a little mouth i recommend a simple three- stitch smile roughly following the contour of round 1 or 2 use the photo below as a guide round 11 * single_crochet 3 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x 30 sts round 12 * single_crochet 4 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x 36 sts round 12 * single_crochet 5 2 single_crochet in next st repeat from * 6x 42 sts work even for 8 row to form fish s body rounds 13-20 single_crochet around 42 sts pause here to attach eyes and sew on mouth then stuff round 21 *single_crochet 5 decrease repeat from * 6x 36 sts round 22 *single_crochet 4 decrease repeat from * 6x 30 sts round 23 *single_crochet 3 decrease repeat from * 6x 24 sts round 24 *single_crochet 6 decrease repeat from * 3x 21 sts round 25 *single_crochet 5 decrease repeat from * 3x 18 sts round 26 *single_crochet 4 decrease repeat from * 3x 15 sts round 27 *single_crochet 3 decrease repeat from
